chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall d : DTA, DTA_kill_empty_states_lazy d = DTA_kill_empty_states d

Premises:
DTA_kill_empty_states = fun d : DTA => DTA_kill (dta_states_non_empty d) d : DTA -> DTA
DTA_kill_empty_states_lazy = fun d : DTA => DTA_kill (dta_states_non_empty_lazy d) d : DTA -> DTA
Inductive DTA : Set := dta : preDTA -> ad -> DTA
dta_states_non_empty_lazy_eg_dta_states_non_empty : forall d : DTA, dta_states_non_empty_lazy d = dta_states_non_empty d
DTA_ind : forall P : DTA -> Prop, (forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad), P (dta p a)) -> forall d : DTA, P d
DTA_rec : forall P : DTA -> Set, (forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad), P (dta p a)) -> forall d : DTA, P d
DTA_rect : forall P : DTA -> Type, (forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad), P (dta p a)) -> forall d : DTA, P d
dta_compat_check_complete : forall (d : DTA) (sigma : signature), dta_compat_check d sigma = true -> dta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma
predta_compat_check_complete : forall (d : preDTA) (sigma : signature), predta_compat_check d sigma = true -> predta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma
predta_compat_check_correct : forall (d : preDTA) (sigma : signature), predta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> predta_compat_check d sigma = true
dta_compat_check_correct : forall (d : DTA) (sigma : signature), dta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> dta_compat_check d sigma = true
Inductive reconnaissance : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop := rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t with state_reconnait : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop := rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl) with liste_reconnait : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list ->...-> liste_reconnait d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
dta_states_non_empty = fun d : DTA => match d with | dta p _ => dta_non_empty_states p end : DTA -> Map bool
dta_states_non_empty_lazy = fun d : DTA => match d with | dta p _ => dta_non_empty_states_lazy p end : DTA -> Map bool
dtas_correct_wrt_sign_compatibles : forall (sigma : signature) (d d' : DTA), dta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> dta_correct_wrt_sign d' sigma -> dta_compatible d d'
predtas_correct_wrt_sign_compatibles : forall (sigma : signature) (d d' : preDTA), predta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> predta_correct_wrt_sign d' sigma -> predta_compatible d d'
DTA_simpl = fun d : DTA => match d with | dta p a => match MapGet state p a with | Some _ => dta p a | None => dta (M1 state 0%N (M0 prec_list)) 0%N end end : DTA -> DTA
dta_app_ne = fun (d : preDTA) (m : Map bool) => dta_app_ne_aux d m m : preDTA -> Map bool -> Map bool
dta_non_empty_states_lazy = fun d : preDTA => lazy_power bool eqm_bool (dta_app_ne d) (map_mini state d) (S (MapCard state d)) : preDTA -> Map bool
dta_non_empty_states = fun d : preDTA => power (Map bool) (dta_app_ne d) (map_mini state d) (S (MapCard state d)) : preDTA -> Map bool
predta_correct_wrt_sign = fun (d : preDTA) (sigma : signature) => forall (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> state_correct_wrt_sign s sigma : preDTA -> signature -> Prop
dta_correct_wrt_sign = fun (d : DTA) (sigma : signature) => match d with | dta d0 _ => predta_correct_wrt_sign d0 sigma end : DTA -> signature -> Prop
dta_compat_check = fun (d : DTA) (sigma : signature) => match d with | dta p _ => predta_compat_check p sigma end : DTA -> signature -> bool
reconnait = fun (d : DTA) (t : term) => match d with | dta p a => reconnaissance p a t end : DTA -> term -> Prop
dta_rec_term = fun (d : DTA) (t : term) => match d with | dta p a => rec_term p a t (essence t p) end : DTA -> term -> bool
rec_term = fix rec_term (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (n : nat) {struct n} : bool := match n with | 0 => false | S k => match t with | app c l => match MapGet state d a with | Some lts => match MapGet prec_list lts c with | Some pre => rec_list_terms d pre l k | None => false end | None => false end end end with rec_list_terms (d : preDTA) (pre : prec_list) (l : term_list) (n : nat) {struct n} : bool := match n with | 0 => false | S k => match pre with | prec_cons st stp pre' => match l with | tnil => false | tcons hd tl => (rec_list_terms d pre' l k || rec_term d st hd k && rec_list_terms d stp tl k)%bool end | prec_empty => match l with | tnil => true | tcons _ _ => false end end end for rec_term : pre...
DTA_kill = fun (m : Map bool) (d : DTA) => match d with | dta p a => DTA_simpl (dta (preDTA_kill m p) a) end : Map bool -> DTA -> DTA
predta_compat_check = fix predta_compat_check (d : preDTA) (sigma : signature) {struct d} : bool := match d with | @M0 _ => true | @M1 _ _ s => st_compat_check s sigma | @M2 _ x y => (predta_compat_check x sigma && predta_compat_check y sigma)%bool end : preDTA -> signature -> bool

```coq
intros d.
induction d using DTA_ind.
- simpl.
  rewrite <- dta_states_non_empty_lazy_eg_dta_states_non_empty.
  auto.
Qed.

original: intros d. induction d using DTA_ind. - simpl. rewrite <- dta_states_non_empty_lazy_eg_dta_states_non_empty. auto.
